data.text: @nolifeneet I'm getting tired of the buzzwords.

@xPandamoniumz @nolifeneet And they were put there by Obama and Biden.........(2014)
https://t.co/tpuACO0T22
@nolifeneet This is true. Research for yourself before you post stuff.

@nolifeneet It wasn't a pro Russian source bit yeah it makes sense that Ukraine would want to downplay things. Just reporting what I had heard/seen recently. I know the Azov Battalion's been around for a while now. They're mostly near Mariupol

@xPandamoniumz They're still around and they still have fascists. My understanding is that the government took it over (as with other militias after euromaidan) so it includes other, but it's still a serious problem.

And I don't trust any "pro-Russian" source on that stuff either.

@nolifeneet I was under the impression that the Azov Battalion was a barely tolerated militia (The guys in the photo) but now I'm hearing the Nazi members within were actually removed. All this occured years ago 🤷

Not that this is a surprise given that the group has used Holocaust denier Marco Pietro for security

Although groups have changed, the Vancouver "anti-lockdown" (anti-mask, anti-vaccine, anti-mandate etc.) has a continuous record of antisemitism that has never been reckoned with
